abstract: North Korea and South Korea agree to resume high-level discussions in December that will focus on easing tensions and improving diplomatic relations.
lead_paragraph: The talks, to be led by a vice minister from each side, are intended to ease tensions and improve relations on the divided Korean Peninsula.

headline.main: North and South Korea to Hold High-Level Talks Next Month
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; North and South Korea Agree to Talks

snippet: The talks, to be led by a vice minister from each side, are intended to ease tensions and improve relations on the divided Korean Peninsula.
